Rob Anderson

Research Software Engineer

I am a developer interested in making cool things both on the web and in apps. By day I'm a Research Software Engineer at Open Lab, a cross-disciplinary research group at Newcastle University. I make web technologies and apps to support researcher's projects ranging from Transport Engagements through Geolocation based tools all the way to Global WhatsApp games.


To make these projects happen I make use of a lot of technologies and methodologies. I'm a keen test driven developer and agile worker and always like to try out and use different frameworks. For instance this site uses Parcel and Pug with a sprinkle of Sass. To host all my projects I use Docker to containerize and orchestrate my web stacks so that they are robust and go down as little as possible and I'm quite excited about Kubernetes at the moment.


My latest projects are always on GitHub and my latest ramblings are on Twitter.
